scripts.copy.ios: cp -R checkbox.*.js demo/node_modules/nativescript-checkbox && cd demo && tns livesync ios --watch
scripts.buildrun: npm run build && cp -R checkbox.*.js demo/node_modules/nativescript-checkbox
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cdcd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.debug.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug ios
scripts.debug.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-checkbox && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
